To identify condition-specific connections, we inferred networks in the CON and RES groups separately for each tissue. Based on the concept of differential connectivity
25 , we identified the most rewired genes between the groups (Tables S1, S2, S3). Despite the similar topological behavior, overall, we found a gain of connectivity in networks from RES (Fig.Â 6A,B). These networks followed a scale-free model with R-squared ranging from 0.67 to 0.89.
